main event: Several observers reported seeing a large, silent, hovering object emitting a brilliant light over McMinnville, Oregon, on December 11, 1963.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 20-30 minutes and was reported shortly after dark., The object was described as a large, metallic, disc-like shape that hovered silently and moved with astonishing speed., Witnesses noted that the object was not an ordinary aircraft and its movements could not be attributed to familiar aviation patterns., Mr. and Mrs. Paul W. Trent observed two disc-like objects drifting slowly in the sky and reported hearing a loud roar as they disappeared., The case remains unsolved with no logical explanation provided by the Air Force.
sighted object: large, silent hovering object emitting brilliant light
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Paul W. Trent, local farmers
